p:
Dichlorvos ( O, O-dimethyl O-2,2-dichlorovinylphosphate or DDVP) (Fig.Â 1) is one of the most popular organophosphate (OP) insecticides widely used to control C. maculatus in developing nations, such as Cameroon and Nigeria
20, 30 . However, the repeated use of this OP has led to an increase in its level in several ecosystems and development of resistance in C. maculatus populations
31 .
